text: Initially felt a bit suspicious cos we were the only table seated. But the tables filled up very shortly and it was bustling. The food was fantastic. We had the grilled eggplant lasagne style. Really enjoyed the burrata pistachio pizza. Service was also very prompt and friendly. Would definitely go back for the dessert alone too. The tiramisu was to die for.

My family’s long time favourite Italian restaurant in Singapore! We absolutely love the pizza bianca - it’s a must order every time we come here. Unpretentious and delicious Italian food with a cozy atmosphere, cannot go wrong!
Great dining experience with a cosy ambience. Truly had an enjoyable evening with friends.. recommended..

This was the first time trying the restaurant, the food was full of flavour and cooked well. We had the clams in white wine sauce to start, a margarita pizza, the angel hair crabmeat pasta with a tomato base, and the lamp chop. We had drinks as well.

The food was all excellent and the ambience lovely and quiet — would recommend this place for a nicer dinner and/or date night!

The service staff were all very helpful, gave great recommendations and it was easy to get their attention when we needed something.

Had a wonderful meal yesterday at Lafiandra Ristorante. Wanted to visit after watching a review from Edo Lio on TikTok. Since it's recommended by an Italian himself, then should be good!

It came as a surprise that no bread basket was served and there was no pictures on the menu as well. So it was a struggle to order and we ended up ordering our usuals.

The food came quite fast after ordering and we gulped it all down within 1 hour. It was a fast game.  Pictures don't do the food justice enough.

The carbonara with cooked with zucchini and it was our first time trying this out. The zucchini gave the carbonara a fresh and light taste compared to being overly cheesy. It was definitely something new. Overall we enjoyed it but saltiness level can be toned down with improvement to pasta portion as it feels small. Ordering this as a main will not be filling.

Overall 5/5
Hope that QR ordering system can be integrated. Bread basket can be served. Menu can be changed with pictures of the food and with recommended items to guide first timers.
